00001  ######################################################################
00002 # Name:    sidebar.tcl
00003 # Author:  Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00004 # Date:    10/03/2013
00005 # Brief:   Handles the UI and related functionality associated with the
00006 #          sidebar.
00007 ######################################################################
00008 
00009 namespace eval sidebar {
00010   
00011   array set widgets {}
00012   array set images  {}
00013   
00014   ######################################################################
00015   # Creates the sidebar UI and initializes it.
00016   proc create {w} {
00017     
00018     variable widgets
00019     variable images
00020     
00021     # Create needed images
00022     set images(sopen) [image create bitmap -file [file join $::tke_dir lib images sopen.bmp] \
00023                                            -maskfile [file join $::tke_dir lib images sopen.bmp] \
00024                                            -foreground "yellow"]
00025     
00026     # Create the top-level frame
00027     set widgets(frame) [ttk::frame $w]
00028     
00029     # Add the file tree elements
00030     set widgets(tl) \
00031       [tablelist::tablelist $w.tl -columns {0 {} 0 {}} -showlabels 0 -exportselection 0 \
00032         -treecolumn 0 -treestyle aqua -forceeditendcommand 1 -expandcommand sidebar::expand_directory \
00033         -relief flat -highlightthickness 0 \
00034         -foreground [utils::get_default_foreground] -background [utils::get_default_background] \
00035         -editstartcommand  "sidebar::edit_start_command" \
00036         -editendcommand    "sidebar::edit_end_command" \
00037         -tooltipaddcommand "sidebar::show_tooltip" \
00038         -tooltipdelcommand "sidebar::hide_tooltip" \
00039         -yscrollcommand    "utils::set_yscrollbar $w.vb"]
00040     set widgets(sb) [ttk::scrollbar $w.vb -orient vertical -command "$widgets(tl) yview"]
00041     
00042     $widgets(tl) columnconfigure 0 -name name   -editable 0 -formatcommand "sidebar::format_name"
00043     $widgets(tl) columnconfigure 1 -name ocount -editable 0 -hide 1
00044     
00045     bind $widgets(tl)           <<TablelistSelect>>     "sidebar::handle_selection"
00046     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <Button-$::right_click> "sidebar::handle_right_click %W %x %y"
00047     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <Double-Button-1>       "sidebar::handle_double_click %W %x %y"
00048     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <FocusIn>               "sidebar::unhide_scrollbar"
00049     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <FocusOut>              "sidebar::hide_scrollbar"
00050     bind $widgets(frame)        <Enter>                 "sidebar::unhide_scrollbar"
00051     bind $widgets(frame)        <Leave>                 "sidebar::hide_scrollbar"
00052     
00053     grid rowconfigure    $w 0 -weight 1
00054     grid columnconfigure $w 0 -weight 1
00055     grid $w.tl -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news
00056     grid $w.vb -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00057     
00058     # Create directory popup
00059     set widgets(menu) [menu $w.popupMenu -tearoff 0 -postcommand "sidebar::menu_post"]
00060     
00061     # Handle traces
00062     trace variable preferences::prefs(Sidebar/IgnoreFilePatterns) w sidebar::handle_ignore_file_patterns
00063     
00064     return $w
00065     
00066   }
00067   
00068   ######################################################################
00069   # Hides the given scrollbar.
00070   proc hide_scrollbar {} {
00071     
00072     variable widgets
00073     
00074     # Set the yscrollcommand to the normal kind
00075     $widgets(tl) configure -yscrollcommand "$widgets(sb) set"
00076     
00077     # Hide the sidebar
00078     grid remove $widgets(sb)
00079     
00080   }
00081   
00082   ######################################################################
00083   # Unhides the given scrollbar (if it needs to be displayed).
00084   proc unhide_scrollbar {} {
00085     
00086     variable widgets
00087     
00088     # Set the yscrollcommand to the auto-hide version
00089     $widgets(tl) configure -yscrollcommand "utils::set_yscrollbar $widgets(sb)"
00090 
00091     # Run the set_yscrollbar command
00092     if {[llength [set sb_get [$widgets(sb) get]]] == 2} {
00093       utils::set_yscrollbar $widgets(sb) {*}$sb_get
00094     }
00095     
00096   }
00097   
00098   ######################################################################
00099   # Handles the contents of the sidebar popup menu prior to it being posted.
00100   proc menu_post {} {
00101     
00102     variable widgets
00103     
00104     # Get the current index
00105     set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00106     
00107     if {[$widgets(tl) parentkey $row] eq "root"} {
00108       setup_root_menu $row
00109     } elseif {[file isdirectory [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]]} {
00110       setup_dir_menu $row
00111     } else {
00112       setup_file_menu $row
00113     }
00114     
00115   }
00116   
00117   ######################################################################
00118   # Sets up the popup menu to be suitable for the given directory.
00119   proc setup_dir_menu {index} {
00120     
00121     variable widgets
00122     
00123     # Clear the menu
00124     $widgets(menu) delete 0 end
00125     
00126     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "New File"] -command {
00127       sidebar::add_file_to_folder
00128     }
00129     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "New Directory"] -command {
00130       sidebar::add_folder_to_folder
00131     }
00132     
00133     $widgets(menu) add separator
00134     
00135     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Open Directory Files"] -command {
00136       sidebar::open_folder_files
00137     }
00138     
00139     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Close Directory Files"] -command {
00140       sidebar::close_folder_files
00141     }
00142     
00143     $widgets(menu) add separator
00144     
00145     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Rename"] -command {
00146       sidebar::rename_folder
00147     }
00148     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Delete"] -command {
00149       sidebar::delete_folder
00150     }
00151     
00152     $widgets(menu) add separator
00153     
00154     if {[favorites::is_favorite [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text]]} {
00155       $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Unfavorite"] -command {
00156         sidebar::unfavorite
00157       }
00158     } else {
00159       $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Favorite"] -command {
00160         sidebar::favorite
00161       }
00162     }
00163     
00164     $widgets(menu) add separator
00165     
00166     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Remove from Sidebar"] -command {
00167       sidebar::remove_folder
00168     }
00169     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Remove Parent from Sidebar"] -command {
00170       sidebar::remove_parent_folder
00171     }
00172     
00173     $widgets(menu) add separator
00174     
00175     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Make Current Working Directory"] -command {
00176       sidebar::set_current_working_directory
00177     }
00178     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Refresh Directory Files"] -command {
00179       sidebar::refresh_directory_files
00180     }
00181     
00182     # Add plugins to sidebar directory popup
00183     plugins::handle_dir_popup $widgets(menu)
00184     
00185   }

00306   ######################################################################
00307   # Returns the sidebar index of the given filename.  If the filename
00308   # was not found in the sidebar, return a value of -1.
00309   proc get_index {fname} {
00310     
00311     variable widgets
00312     
00313     return [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]
00314     
00315   }
00316   
00317   ######################################################################
00318   # Returns the index of the current selection.  If nothing is currently
00319   # selected, returns -1.
00320   proc get_selected_index {} {
00321     
00322     variable widgets
00323     
00324     # Get the current selection
00325     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00326     
00327     return [expr {($selected eq "") ? -1 : $selected}]
00328     
00329   }
00330   
00331   ######################################################################
00332   # Returns the information specified by attr for the file at the given
00333   # sidebar index.
00334   proc get_info {index attr} {
00335     
00336     variable widgets
00337     
00338     switch $attr {
00339       fname      { return [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text] }
00340       file_index { return [gui::get_file_index [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text]]}
00341       default    {
00342         return -code error "Illegal sidebar attribute specified ($attr)"
00343       }
00344     }
00345     
00346   }

00348   ######################################################################
00349   # Highlights (or dehighlights) the given filename in the file system
00350   # sidebar.
00351   proc highlight_filename {fname highlight} {
00352     
00353     variable widgets
00354     variable images
00355     
00356     # Find the main directory containing the file
00357     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]] != -1} {
00358       set highlighted [expr {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -image] eq $images(sopen)}]
00359       if {$highlight} {
00360         if {!$highlighted} {
00361           update_root_count $row 1
00362         }
00363         $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -image $images(sopen)
00364       } else {
00365         $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -image ""
00366         if {$highlighted} {
00367           update_root_count $row -1
00368         }
00369       }
00370     }
00371     
00372   }
00373   
00374   ######################################################################
00375   # Adds the given directory which displays within the file browser.
00376   proc add_directory {dir} {
00377     
00378     variable widgets
00379     
00380     # Get the length of the directory
00381     set dirlen [string length $dir]
00382     
00383     # Check to see if the directory root has already been added
00384     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $dir -descend -exact]] != -1} {
00385       if {![$widgets(tl) isexpanded $row]} {
00386         $widgets(tl) expand $row -partly
00387       }
00388       update_directory $row
00389       return
00390       
00391     } else {
00392       
00393       set sub_added 0
00394       
00395       # Add the subdirectory if the parent already exists
00396       foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys root] {
00397         set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00398         if {[string compare -length $dirlen $name $dir] == 0} {
00399           if {!$sub_added} {
00400             add_subdirectory root $dir $child
00401             set sub_added 1
00402           } else {
00403             $widgets(tl) delete $child
00404           }
00405         }
00406       }
00407       
00408       if {$sub_added} {
00409         return
00410       }
00411       
00412     }
00413     
00414     # Recursively add directories to the sidebar
00415     add_subdirectory root $dir
00416     
00417   }
00418   
00419   ######################################################################
00420   # Figure out if the given file should be ignored.
00421   proc ignore_file {fname} {
00422 
00423     foreach pattern $preferences::prefs(Sidebar/IgnoreFilePatterns) {
00424       if {[string match $pattern $fname]} {
00425         return 1
00426       }
00427     }
00428     
00429     return 0
00430     
00431   }
00432   
00433   ######################################################################
00434   # Handles directory/file ordering issues
00435   proc order_files_dirs {contents} {
00436     
00437     set contents [lsort $contents]
00438     
00439     # If we need to show the folders at the top, handle this
00440     if {$preferences::prefs(Sidebar/FoldersAtTop)} {
00441       set tmp_dirs  [list]
00442       set tmp_files [list]
00443       foreach name $contents {
00444         if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
00445           lappend tmp_dirs $name
00446         } else {
00447           lappend tmp_files $name
00448         }
00449       }
00450       set contents [concat $tmp_dirs $tmp_files]
00451     }
00452     
00453     return $contents
00454     
00455   }
00456   
00457   ######################################################################
00458   # Recursively adds the current directory and all subdirectories and files
00459   # found within it to the sidebar.
00460   proc add_subdirectory {parent dir {movekey ""}} {
00461     
00462     variable widgets
00463     variable images
00464     
00465     if {[file exists $dir]} {
00466       
00467       # Add the directory to the sidebar
00468       if {$parent eq "root"} {
00469         set parent [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $dir 0]]
00470       }
00471       
00472       # Get the folder contents and sort them
00473       set folder_contents [order_files_dirs [glob -nocomplain -directory $dir *]]
00474       
00475       # Add all of the stuff within this directory
00476       foreach name $folder_contents {
00477         
00478         if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
00479           if {($movekey ne "") && ([$widgets(tl) cellcget $movekey,name -text] eq $name)} {
00480             $widgets(tl) move $movekey $parent end
00481           } else {
00482             set child [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $name 0]]
00483             $widgets(tl) collapse $child
00484           }
00485         } else {
00486           if {![ignore_file $name]} {
00487             set key [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $name 0]]
00488             if {[gui::file_exists $name]} {
00489               $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $key,name -image $images(sopen)
00490               update_root_count $key 1
00491             }
00492           }
00493         }
00494         
00495       }
00496       
00497     }
00498     
00499   }
00500   
00501   ######################################################################
00502   # Recursively updates the given directory (if the child directories
00503   # are already expanded.
00504   proc update_directory_recursively {parent} {
00505     
00506     variable widgets
00507     
00508     # If the parent is not root, update the directory
00509     if {$parent ne "root"} {
00510       update_directory $parent
00511     }
00512     
00513     # Update the child directories that are not expanded
00514     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
00515       if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $child]} {
00516         update_directory_recursively $child
00517       }
00518     }
00519     
00520   }
00521   
00522   ######################################################################
00523   # Update the given directory to include (or uninclude) new file
00524   # information.
00525   proc update_directory {parent} {
00526     
00527     variable widgets
00528     variable images
00529     
00530     # Get the directory contents (removing anything that matches the
00531     # ignored file patterns)
00532     set dir_files [list]
00533     foreach dir_file [glob -nocomplain -directory [$widgets(tl) cellcget $parent,name -text] *] {
00534       if {![ignore_file $dir_file]} {
00535         lappend dir_files $dir_file
00536       }
00537     }
00538     
00539     set dir_files [lassign [order_files_dirs $dir_files] dir_file]
00540     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
00541       set tl_file [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00542       set compare [string compare $tl_file $dir_file]
00543       if {($compare == -1) || ($dir_file eq "")} {
00544         $widgets(tl) delete $child
00545       } else {
00546         while {1} {
00547           if {$compare == 1} {
00548             set node [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent [$widgets(tl) childindex $child] [list $dir_file 0]]
00549             if {[file isdirectory $dir_file]} {
00550               $widgets(tl) collapse $node
00551             } elseif {[gui::file_exists $dir_file]} {
00552               $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $node,name -image $images(sopen)
00553             }
00554           }
00555           set dir_files [lassign $dir_files dir_file]
00556           if {($compare == 0) || ($dir_file eq "")} { break }
00557           set compare [string compare $tl_file $dir_file]
00558         }
00559       }
00560     }
00561     
00562   }
00563   
00564   ######################################################################
00565   # Formats the name such that the full pathname is reduced to the tail
00566   # of the pathname.
00567   proc format_name {value} {
00568     
00569     return [file tail $value]
00570     
00571   }
00572   
00573   ######################################################################
00574   # Finds the root directory of the given descendent and updates its
00575   # value +/- the value.
00576   proc update_root_count {descendant value} {
00577     
00578     variable widgets
00579     
00580     # Get the root directory in the table
00581     while {[set parent [$widgets(tl) parentkey $descendant]] ne "root"} {
00582       set descendant $parent
00583     }
00584     
00585     # Increment/decrement the descendant row by the given value
00586     set ocount [expr [$widgets(tl) cellcget $descendant,ocount -text] + $value]
00587     $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $descendant,ocount -text $ocount
00588     
00589     # If the user wants us to auto-remove when the open file count reaches 0,
00590     # remove it from the sidebar
00591     if {$preferences::prefs(Sidebar/RemoveRootAfterLastClose) && ($ocount == 0)} {
00592       $widgets(tl) delete $descendant
00593     }
00594     
00595   }
00596   
00597   ######################################################################
00598   # Expands the currently selected directory.
00599   proc expand_directory {tbl row} {
00600     
00601     # Clean the subdirectory
00602     $tbl delete [$tbl childkeys $row]
00603 
00604     # Add the missing subdirectory
00605     add_subdirectory $row [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00606     
00607   }
00608   
00609   ######################################################################
00610   # Begins the edit process.
00611   proc edit_start_command {tbl row col value} {
00612     
00613     return $value
00614     
00615   }
00616   
00617   ######################################################################
00618   # Ends the edit process.
00619   proc edit_end_command {tbl row col value} {
00620     
00621     variable images
00622     
00623     # Get the current pathname
00624     set old_name [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00625     
00626     # Create the new pathname
00627     set new_name [file join [file dirname $old_name] $value]
00628 
00629     # If the value of the cell hasn't changed, do nothing else.
00630     if {$old_name eq $new_name} {
00631       return $old_name
00632     }
00633     
00634     # Change the cell so that it can't be edited directly
00635     $tbl cellconfigure $row,$col -editable 0
00636     
00637     # Perform the rename operation
00638     if {![catch { file rename -force $old_name $new_name }]} {
00639     
00640       # Place the new value in the filepath cell
00641       $tbl cellconfigure $row,name -text $new_name
00642     
00643       # If this is a displayed file, update the file information
00644       if {[$tbl cellcget $row,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00645         gui::change_filename $old_name $new_name
00646       }
00647       
00648       # Update the directory
00649       after idle [list sidebar::update_directory [$tbl parentkey $row]]
00650       
00651       return $new_name
00652 
00653     } else {
00654       
00655       return $old_name
00656       
00657     }
00658     
00659   }
00660   
00661   ######################################################################
00662   # Displays a tooltip for each root row.
00663   proc show_tooltip {tbl row col} {
00664     
00665     if {($row >= 0) && ([$tbl parentkey $row] eq "root")} {
00666       tooltip::tooltip $tbl [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00667     } else {
00668       tooltip::tooltip clear
00669     }
00670     
00671   }
00672   
00673   ######################################################################
00674   # Hides the tooltip associated with the root row.
00675   proc hide_tooltip {tbl} {
00676     
00677     tooltip::tooltip clear
00678     
00679   }
00680   
00681   ######################################################################
00682   # Handle a selection change to the sidebar.
00683   proc handle_selection {} {
00684     
00685     variable widgets
00686     variable images
00687     
00688     # Get the current selection
00689     if {[llength [set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]]]} {
00690     
00691       # If the file is currently in the notebook, make it the current tab
00692       if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00693         gui::set_current_tab_from_fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00694       }
00695       
00696     }
00697     
00698   }
00699   
00700   ######################################################################
00701   # Handles right click from the sidebar table.
00702   proc handle_right_click {W x y} {
00703     
00704     variable widgets
00705     
00706     foreach {tablelist::W tablelist::x tablelist::y} [tablelist::convEventFields $W $x $y] {}
00707     foreach {row col} [split [$widgets(tl) containingcell $tablelist::x $tablelist::y] ,] {}
00708     
00709     if {$row != -1} {
00710       
00711       # Set the selection to the right-clicked element
00712       $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
00713       $widgets(tl) selection set $row
00714       handle_selection
00715       
00716       # Display the menu
00717       tk_popup $widgets(menu) [expr [winfo rootx $W] + $x] [expr [winfo rooty $W] + $y]
00718       
00719     }
00720     
00721   }
00722   
00723   ######################################################################
00724   # Handles double-click from the sidebar table.
00725   proc handle_double_click {W x y} {
00726     
00727     variable widgets
00728     
00729     foreach {tablelist::W tablelist::x tablelist::y} [tablelist::convEventFields $W $x $y] {}
00730     foreach {row col} [split [$widgets(tl) containingcell $tablelist::x $tablelist::y] ,] {}
00731     
00732     if {$row != -1} {
00733       
00734       if {[file isfile [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]]} {
00735       
00736         # Select the file
00737         $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
00738         $widgets(tl) selection set $row
00739       
00740         # Open the file in the viewer
00741         gui::add_file end [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]
00742         
00743       } else {
00744         
00745         if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $row]} {
00746           $widgets(tl) collapse $row
00747         } else {
00748           $widgets(tl) expand $row
00749         }
00750         
00751       }
00752       
00753     }
00754     
00755   }
00756   
00757   ######################################################################
00758   # Adds a new file to the currently selected folder.
00759   proc add_file_to_folder {} {
00760     
00761     variable widgets
00762     
00763     # Get the currently selected row
00764     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00765     
00766     # Get the new filename from the user
00767     set fname ""
00768     if {![gui::user_response_get "File Name:" fname]} {
00769       return
00770     }
00771     
00772     # Normalize the pathname
00773     if {[file pathtype $fname] eq "relative"} {
00774       set fname [file normalize [file join [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text] $fname]]
00775     }
00776     
00777     # Create the file
00778     if {![catch { exec touch $fname }]} {
00779     
00780       # Expand the directory
00781       $widgets(tl) expand $selected -partly
00782     
00783       # Add a new file to the directory
00784       # set key [$widgets(tl) insertchild $selected 0 [list $fname 0]]
00785     
00786       # Create an empty file
00787       gui::add_file end $fname
00788     
00789     }
00790     
00791   }
00792   
00793   ######################################################################
00794   # Adds a new folder to the currently selected folder.
00795   proc add_folder_to_folder {} {
00796     
00797     variable widgets
00798     
00799     # Get the currently selected row
00800     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00801     
00802     # Get the directory name from the user
00803     set dname ""
00804     if {![gui::user_response_get "Directory Name:" dname]} {
00805       return
00806     }
00807     
00808     # Normalize the pathname
00809     if {[file pathtype $dname] eq "relative"} {
00810       set dname [file normalize [file join [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text] $dname]]
00811     }
00812     
00813     # Create the directory
00814     if {![catch { file mkdir $dname }]} {
00815     
00816       # Expand the directory
00817       $widgets(tl) expand $selected -partly
00818     
00819       # Update the directory
00820       update_directory $selected
00821     
00822     }
00823     
00824   }

00826   ######################################################################
00827   # Opens all of the files in the current directory.
00828   proc open_folder_files {} {
00829     
00830     variable widgets
00831     variable images
00832     
00833     # Get the currently selected row
00834     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00835     
00836     # Open all of the children that are not already opened
00837     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $selected] {
00838       set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00839       if {([$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -image] ne $images(sopen)) && [file isfile $name]} {
00840         gui::add_file end $name
00841       }
00842     }
00843     
00844   }
00845       
00846   ######################################################################
00847   # Close all of the open files in the current directory.
00848   proc close_folder_files {} {
00849     
00850     variable widgets
00851     variable images
00852     
00853     # Get the currently selected row
00854     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00855     
00856     # Close all of the opened children
00857     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $selected] {
00858       if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00859         gui::close_file [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00860       }
00861     }
00862     
00863   }

00866   # Allows the user to rename the currently selected folder.
00867   proc rename_folder {{row ""}} {
00868     
00869     variable widgets
00870     
00871     # Get the currently selected row
00872     if {$row eq ""} {
00873       set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00874     }
00875     
00876     # Make the row editable
00877     $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -editable 1
00878     $widgets(tl) editcell $row,name
00879     
00880   }

00882   ######################################################################
00883   # Allows the user to delete the currently selected folder.
00884   proc delete_folder {} {
00885     
00886     variable widgets
00887     
00888     if {[tk_messageBox -parent . -type yesno -default yes -message [msgcat::mc "Delete directory?"]] eq "yes"} {
00889       
00890       # Get the currently selected row
00891       set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00892       
00893       # Get the directory pathname
00894       set dirpath [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00895       
00896       # Delete the folder
00897       if {![catch { file delete -force $dirpath }]} {
00898         
00899         # Remove the directory from the file browser
00900         $widgets(tl) delete $selected
00901         
00902       }
00903       
00904     }
00905     
00906   }

00908   ######################################################################
00909   # Causes the currently selected folder/file to become a favorite.
00910   proc favorite {} {
00911     
00912     variable widgets
00913     
00914     # Get the currently selected row
00915     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00916     
00917     # Set the folder to be a favorite
00918     favorites::add [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00919       
00920   }

00923   # Causes the currently selected folder/file to become a non-favorite.

00930     
00931     # Remove the folder from the favorites list
00932     favorites::remove [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00933

00936   ######################################################################
00937   # Removes the selected folder from the sidebar.
00938   proc remove_folder {} {
00939     
00940     variable widgets
00941     
00942     # Get the currently selected row
00943     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00944     
00945     # Delete the row and its children
00946     $widgets(tl) delete $selected
00947     
00948   }
00949   
00950   ######################################################################
00951   # Removes the parent(s) of the currently selected folder from the sidebar.
00952   proc remove_parent_folder {} {
00953     
00954     variable widgets
00955     
00956     # Get the currently selected row
00957     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00958     
00959     # Find the child index of the ancestor of the root
00960     set child $selected
00961     while {[set parent [$widgets(tl) parentkey $child]] ne "root"} {
00962       set child $parent
00963     }
00964     
00965     # Move the currently selected row to root
00966     $widgets(tl) move $selected root [$widgets(tl) childindex $child]
00967     
00968     # Delete the child tree
00969     $widgets(tl) delete $child
00970     
00971   }
00972

00974   # Sets the currently selected directory to the working directory.
00975   proc set_current_working_directory {} {
00976     
00977     variable widgets
00978     
00979     # Get the currently selected row
00980     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00981     
00982     # Set the current working directory to the selected pathname
00983     cd [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00984     
00985     # Update the UI
00986     gui::set_title
00987     
00988   }

01033   ######################################################################
01034   # Closes the currently selected file in the notebook.
01035   proc close_file {} {
01036     
01037     variable widgets
01038     variable images
01039     
01040     # Get the current selection
01041     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01042     
01043     # If the current file is selected, close it
01044     if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
01045       
01046       # Close the tab at the current location
01047       gui::close_file [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
01048       
01049     }
01050     
01051   }

01054   # Allow the user to rename the currently selected file in the file
01055   # browser.
01056   proc rename_file {{row ""}} {
01057     
01058     variable widgets
01059     
01060     # Get the current selection
01061     if {$row eq ""} {

01063     }

01070   
01071   ######################################################################
01072   # Creates a duplicate of the currently selected file, adds it to the
01073   # sideband and allows the user to modify its name.
01074   proc duplicate_file {} {
01075     
01076     variable widgets
01077     
01078     # Get the current selection
01079     set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01080     
01081     # Get the filename of the current selection
01082     set fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]
01083     
01084     # Create the default name of the duplicate file
01085     set dup_fname "[file rootname $fname] Copy[file extension $fname]"
01086     set num       1
01087     while {[file exists $dup_fname]} {
01088       set dup_fname "[file rootname $fname] Copy [incr num][file extension $fname]"
01089     }
01090     
01091     # Copy the file to create the duplicate
01092     if {![catch { file copy $fname $dup_fname } rc]} {
01093     
01094       # Add the file to the sidebar (just below the currently selected line)
01095       set new_row [$widgets(tl) insertchild \
01096         [$widgets(tl) parentkey $row] [expr [$widgets(tl) childindex $row] + 1] \
01097         [list $dup_fname 0]]
01098     
01099       # Make the new row editable
01100       $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $new_row,name -editable 1
01101       $widgets(tl) editcell      $new_row,name
01102       
01103     }
01104     
01105   }
01106   
01107   ######################################################################
01108   # Deletes the currently selected file.
01109   proc delete_file {} {
01110     
01111     variable widgets
01112     variable images
01113     
01114     # Get confirmation from the user
01115     if {[tk_messageBox -parent . -type yesno -default yes -message [msgcat::mc "Delete file?"]] eq "yes"} {
01116       
01117       # Get the current selection
01118       set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01119       
01120       # Get the full pathname
01121       set fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
01122       
01123       # Delete the file
01124       if {![catch { file delete -force $fname }]} {
01125 
01126         # Get the background color before we delete the row
01127         set bg [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image]
01128         
01129         # Delete the row in the table
01130         $widgets(tl) delete $selected
01131 
01132         # Close the tab if the file is currently in the notebook
01133         if {$bg eq $images(sopen)} {
01134           gui::close_file $fname
01135         }
01136       
01137       }
01138       
01139     }
01140     
01141   }

01146 
01147     # Update all of the top-level directories
01148     update_directory_recursively root
01149 
01150   }

01152   ######################################################################
01153   # Handle any changes to the General/WindowTheme preference variable.
01154   proc handle_window_theme {theme} {
01155     
01156     variable widgets
01157     
01158     set foreground [utils::get_default_foreground]
01159     set background [utils::get_default_background]
01160     
01161     # Configure the tablelist widget
01162     if {[info exists widgets(tl)]} {
01163       $widgets(tl) configure -foreground $foreground -background $background
01164     }
01165     
01166   }
01167   
01168   ######################################################################
01169   # Returns a list of files specifically for use in the "find in files"
01170   # function.
01171   proc get_fif_files {} {
01172     
01173     variable widgets
01174     variable images
01175     
01176     set fif_files [list]
01177     set odirs     [list]
01178     set ofiles    [list]
01179     
01180     # Gather the lists of files, opened files and opened directories
01181     for {set i 0} {$i < [$widgets(tl) size]} {incr i} {
01182       set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $i,name -text]
01183       if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
01184         if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $i] || ([$widgets(tl) parentkey $i] eq "root")} {
01185           lappend odirs $name
01186         }
01187         lappend fif_files [list $name $name]
01188       } else {
01189         if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $i,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
01190           lappend ofiles $name
01191         }
01192         lappend fif_files [list $name $name]
01193       }
01194     }
01195     
01196     # Add the favorites list
01197     foreach favorite [favorites::get_list] {
01198       if {[lsearch -index 1 $fif_files $favorite] == -1} {
01199         lappend fif_files [list $favorite $favorite]
01200       }
01201     }
01202     
01203     # Add the Opened files/directories
01204     if {[llength $ofiles] > 0} {
01205       lappend fif_files [list {Opened Files} $ofiles]
01206     }
01207     if {[llength $odirs] > 0} {
01208       lappend fif_files [list {Opened Directories} $odirs]
01209     }
01210     lappend fif_files [list {Current Directory} [pwd]]
01211     
01212     return [lsort -index 0 $fif_files]
01213     
01214   }
01215   
01216   ######################################################################
01217   # Recursively expands the tablelist to show the given filename.
01218   proc show_file_helper {parent fdir} {
01219     
01220     variable widgets
01221     
01222     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
01223       set dir [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
01224       if {[string compare -length [string length $dir] $fdir $dir] == 0} {
01225         $widgets(tl) expand $child -partly
01226         if {$fdir ne $dir} {
01227           show_file_helper $child $fdir
01228         }
01229         return 1
01230       }
01231     }
01232     
01233     return 0
01234     
01235   }
01236   
01237   ######################################################################
01238   # Shows the given filename in the sidebar browser.  Adds parent
01239   # directory if the file does not exist in the sidebar.
01240   proc show_file {fname} {
01241     
01242     variable widgets
01243     
01244     # Show the file in the sidebar
01245     if {![show_file_helper root [file dirname $fname]]} {
01246       add_directory [file dirname $fname]
01247     }
01248     
01249     # Put the file into view
01250     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]] != -1} {
01251       $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
01252       $widgets(tl) selection set $row
01253       $widgets(tl) see $row
01254     }
01255     
01256   }
